problems.title: Problem 1
problems.content: Use the node-voltage method to find the branch currents i<sub>a</sub> - i<sub>e</sub> in the circuit shown in. Take

parts.title: Part A

parts.title: Part E
parts.content: Find the value of i<sub>e</sub>.
parts.need: Express your answer to three significant figures, with appropriate units.

parts.title: Part F
parts.content: Find the total power developed in the circuit.
parts.need: Express your answer to three significant figures, with appropriate units.
